bibl.title: Letter from R.W. Kerr to Emilie Lawrence Reed, May 21, 1927

div1.p: Kerr thanks Emilie Lawrence Reed for her gift of a rose bush.

div1.head: Letter from R.W. Kerr to Emilie Lawrence Reed, May 21, 1927
div1.p:
We are very thankful to you for the lovely rose
bush received yesterday. It arrived in excellent condition
and has been given my personal attention for its care and
planting.

We will have it suitably marked and cared for,
and will look forward to the pleasure of showing it to
you when you come down next season.

Mrs. Siler remarked last night how beautiful
everything was at Blue Ridge, and we hope that you will
have a delightful summer.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, R.W. Keer
R.W. KERR,
Major, Medical Corps,
Executive Officer. Mrs. Walter Reed,
Blue Ridge, Pa.
